Question: In the Wild Card playoff round this person and the Colts defeated the Denver Broncos 41–10, his first playoff win.
Hints: 18 is retired in honor of Frank Tripucka, he gave this person permission to wear it.
This person did not play particularly well against the Kansas City Chiefs either, throwing no touchdowns.
After a May 23 neck surgery, this person could not use the Colts' facilities for practice and workouts due to the NFL lockout.
